column5: Located in Samagipura reserve. A concrete wall is built to collect spring water and then send it to a water storage tank for distribution. About 60 families use water. The water treatment plant is not functioning and needs to be renovated.

column5: The spring is being preserved and a tank is being built to distribute water. But there are about 25 houses near the spring where people live. Wastewater is being added to spring water through household toilets.
column6: Water Quality Testing needs to be done

column5: Located in St. Leonard's Estate. Spring water is collected in a tank that has been constructed.  An area of water lodging where several springs are located. Two water storage tanks have been constructed on high ground. ( 500 Liter PVC tank and 2.4m x 2.4m x 1.5m concrete tank). Distribution is done after pumping water from the water collection tank at the source to the water storage tank. The pump is currently broken. About 30 families use water. Spring should be preserved.
